mechanics.outcome: A 10-foot radius barrier extends from and moves with the caster, centered on them, for the spell's duration

mechanics.trigger: Creature attempts to pass or reach through the barrier
mechanics.condition: Creature is NOT an Undead AND Creature is NOT a Construct
mechanics.outcome: Creature is prevented from passing or reaching through the barrier

mechanics.trigger: Affected creature attempts to attack or cast spell through barrier
mechanics.condition: Creature is NOT an Undead AND Creature is NOT a Construct AND Creature uses a ranged attack, reach weapon, or spell
mechanics.outcome: Creature can cast spells or make attacks with ranged/reach weapons through the barrier

mechanics.condition: Caster's movement forces a creature (that is NOT Undead and NOT Construct) to pass through the barrier

description_text: A shimmering barrier extends out from you in a 10-foot radius and moves with you, remaining centered on you and hedging out creatures other than undead and constructs. The barrier lasts for the duration. The barrier prevents an affected creature from passing or reaching through. An affected creature can cast spells or make attacks with ranged or reach weapons through the barrier. If you move so that an affected creature is forced to pass through the barrier, the spell ends.
